title: Bach - Die Kunst der Fuge - Scherchen (1965,TAHRA)
description:
* CD info
J.S. Bach - Die Kunst der Fuge (The Art of Fugue) - Scherchen & CBC Toronto - Tahra, 1965

* About the recording
This is a mythical recording of one of the most celebrated work by Bach! Scherchen has done many orchestral version of the Art of the Fugue, and is widely regarded as one of its the best performer. The first track is awesome: we can hear Scherchen (with his thick German accent) and his orchestra rehearsing, giving us very valuable insight both into the interpretation and the work itself. The sound is a bit disappointing, but warm enough to make the listening enjoyable for want of a clear one.

* Technicals 
Total duration - 02h 02m 26s
Average bitrate - 636 kbps
Encoder - FLAC 1.3.1, lossless, compression level 5


* Tracks
Disc: 1
  1. Rehearsal
  2. Announcement
  3. Counterpoint I,
  4. Counterpoint II
  5. Counterpoint III
  6. Counterpoint IV
  7. Counterpoint V
  8. Counterpoint VI
  9. Counterpoint VII
  10. Counterpoint VIII
  11. Counterpoint IX

Disc: 2
  1. Counterpoint X
  2. Counterpoint XI
  3. Counterpoint XII
  4. Counterpoint XIII
  5. Counterpoint XIV
  6. Counterpoint XV
  7. Counterpoint XVI
  8. Counterpoint XVII
  9. Counterpoint XVIII
  10. Closing Announcement
